Implementation approach: We will use the **brute force** approach to solve this problem. We will iterate over all pairs of discs and calculate the area of the intersection between them. The total area covered by the discs will be the sum of the areas of all the intersections.
Data structures and interfaces:
classDiagram
    class Disc {
        -x: float
        -y: float
        -radius: float
        +__init__(x: float, y: float, radius: float)
        +get_area(other: Disc) float
    }

    Disc --> Disc
Program call flow:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Main
    participant Disc
    Main->>Disc: create_discs()
    Disc-->>Main: return discs
    loop for each disc1 in discs
        Main->>Disc: get_area(disc2)
        Disc-->>Main: return area
        Main: sum area
    end
    Main->>Disc: print_area()
